title: Zoids Wild Zero
synopsis: In the 21st century planet Earth was rendered inhospitable to life, and people mass-migrated to Planet Zi, the natural home of metallic life forms known as Zoids.
staff: [['Kato, Takao', ['Director']], ['Matsuoka, Hiroki', ['Sound Director']], ['Yamai, Sayaka', ['Episode Director']], ['MAGIC OF LiFE', ['Theme Song Performance']]]
